title: Shopping and Services 2
sentences: I want to open an account at this bank.
Können Sie mir das Paket bitte
Can you please deliver the package to me?
I have an appointment for a massage.
Where can I return these bottles?
The customer service is very friendly.
Unfortunately, I have to cancel my contract.
Do you have a guarantee on this device?
The delivery takes three working days.
I need a receipt for the company.
Can you give me the change in cash?
The dry cleaner's is today closed.
I want to have these shoes repaired.
Where is the mailbox in this street?
Ich habe ein Paket bei der Post
I picked up a package at the post office.
The shipping costs are included in the price.
Haben Sie dieses Kleid in einer anderen
Do you have this dress in another color?
I want to take out an insurance policy.
I am looking for a parking spot nearby.
Do you have brochures about the offers?
I want to keep my mobile number.
Can you print the receipt for me?
The savings bank is right there in front.
dictionary:
das Konto - account
liefern - to deliver
die Massage - massage
abgeben - to hand in / return
der Kundenservice - customer service
der Vertrag - contract
die Garantie - guarantee
die Lieferung - delivery
die Quittung - receipt
das Wechselgeld - change (money)
die Reinigung - dry cleaner's
reparieren - to repair
der Briefkasten - mailbox
abholen - to pick up
die Versandkosten - shipping costs
die Farbe - color
die Versicherung - insurance
die Werkstatt - workshop / garage
der Parkplatz - parking spot
der Prospekt (Pl. Prospekte) - brochure
die Handynummer - mobile number
defekt - defective / broken
der Beleg - receipt / voucher
die Geheimzahl - PIN (number)
die Sparkasse - savings bank
